arStrings.szText: {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} gains a {c_number}[{SF_9} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance per bounce.
When {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} Critically Strikes, it has a {c_number}[{SF_11} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to form a {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c}.
Each time {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} bounces, it deals {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage for its duration.
